name: Run Turkey Run FREE - Crazy Gobble Jump Fun
name_original: Run Turkey Run FREE - Crazy Gobble Jump Fun
description:
This turkey is in a run for its life! Yikes! Can the turkey gather corn while avoiding farmers with an axe to grind? Double Yikes!! Can you help Tom the Turkey escape? Don’t forget to jump over those logs! This is silly fun!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Run Turkey Run FREE’ Now!!!
